txt.en: The Ghâsh-hai have taken control of the crystal-mine, Kheled-menem.

'While Khazad-dûm is best known for the veins of mithril that filled the depths, we also actively mined crystal. It is a difficult thing to find, growing in deposits deep within the rock. When a good deposit was found, it was always hidden well behind one of our doors.

'It seems that you were not the only one to find one of those deposits. The Ghâsh-hai have set up camp behind one of the hidden doors. As a dwarf, I allow this. I also know that we need to begin mining the crystal again, as darkness floods the depths.

'Head north-west to the crystal-mine of Kheled-menem and defeat the Ghâsh-hai lurking inside. Once that is done, we may begin to mine there again. You might want to bring a friend or two, as the Orcs inside will not be pleased to see you.'

The Ghâsh-hai can be found in the crystal-mine at Kheled-menem, north-east of Anazârmekhem.\n\nEndrith asked you to venture to Kheled-menem and clear the Ghâsh-hai out of the crystal-mine. He warned you might want to bring a friend or two.
'The few remaining Ghâsh-hai have fled Kheled-menem. The crystal mine now once again belongs to the dwarves. I thank you for your help.'
Endrith is at Anazârmekhem, south-west of Kheled-menem.\n\nEndrith will be pleased to hear the Ghâsh-hai have been cleared out of Kheled-menem.
'That crystal is important for exploring the depths further.'
HIDING CONTENT - DNT - Kheled-menem: Stolen Lights
